        private void monitorWidgetVisibility(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane stackPane,
                                     javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane)
        Method responsible for setting the parent visibility. In case of all the widgets in the parent are not visible the parent also shall be not visible and vice-versa
        Parameters:
        stackPane - parent component
        gridPane - parent parent component
